summary.description:
Implementing an open source spatio-temporal search platform for Spatial Data Infrastructures.

Hypermap Registry, remote map services made easy for your SDI.

Hypermap Registry is a platform that manages OWS, Esri REST, and other types of map service harvesting, and orchestration and maintains uptime statistics for services and layers.

Check Hypermap Registry documentation.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'WorldMap'
summary.name: HHypermap
